properties.areaDesc: Towner; Western Walsh County; Cavalier; Eddy; Nelson; Ramsey; Benson
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 9:52PM CST until January 16 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Grand Forks ND
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills.
Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Wind Chill
Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as
40 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, blizzard conditions
possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 possible. Winds
could gust as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...The Devils Lake region.

* WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 7 AM CST Thursday.
For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 7 AM to 3 PM CST Thursday.
For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday evening through
Saturday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite
on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. Plan on slippery
road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly
reduce the visibility.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you
wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the
latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 3 PM CST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON
